text: Face me if you dare, stunted whelp, or do you lack even an Elven maid's courage? I thought the Sons of Grungni were great warriors, but perhaps you are no true Dwarf. Indeed, maybe you are instead some breed of bearded Goblin, though in truth I have seen a finer beard on a Troll's backside. - Wulfrik the Wanderer, to Dwarf King Thurbad Stonebeard, in perfect Khazalid
With the power of the Corrupted Wei-Jin Compass, flames rain from the sky, turning anything they touch into a pile of ash.
A surge of crackling energy and shimmering light streams forth from Fozzrik's Fortress and tears through the battlefield.
Fozzrik's Fortress unfolds like a giant flower, bathing the fighters below in an outpouring of life magic.

A potent mixture of extracted Itxi grub humours, crushed Jungle Lotus leaves and Coatl feathers grants the imbiber renewed vitality and an unparalleled mastery of the Winds of Magic... at least until the effects wear off.

A potent mixture of powdered Ki-rin horn, crushed Jade Lion teeth and Onyx Crowmen feathers grants the imbiber renewed vitality and an unparalleled mastery of the Winds of Magic... at least until the effects wear off.
